text: Diary of a Mad Housewife is a 1970 American comedy drama movie directed by Frank Perry and based on the 1967 novel of the same name by Sue Kaufman. It stars Carrie Snodgress, Richard Benjamin, Frank Langella, Peter Boyle and Alice Cooper and was distributed by Universal Pictures. It was nominated for Best Actress at the Academy Awards in 1971. Diary of a Mad Housewife was released on August 10, 1970. == Reference == ==Other websites== * * * Category:1970 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Frank Perry Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:American sex comedy movies Category:Adultery in movies Category:Golden Globe Award winning movies Category:Feminist movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Diary of a Mad Housewife
